text: Kɨ ia bagha God ko mɨgei, Godra, a ian akuraghtɨ, ia bizir aghuir gɨn izamiba bagh mɨzuamam. God kamaghsua, an Duamɨn gavgavimɨn, a ia damutɨ, ian arazir gɨn izamin bizir aghuiba bagha mɨzuaim, an aghung mangɨ bar ekevegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavir an itimɨn tuavimɨn, a ia damutɨ, navir amɨrizim ko bar akongezir arazim, bar ia gizɨvagham.
